pr_title: Ano 29367 resolve error message at new product category

timeline.author: ale-axelor
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -62,7 +62,8 @@

 	<action-attrs name="action-attrs-product-category-form-set-hidden">
-		<attribute name="hidden" for="sequence" expr="eval: __config__.app.getApp('base').getProductSequenceTypeSelect() != 'Per product category' || __repo__(ProductCategory).all().filter('self.parentProductCategory.id = ?', id).count() > 0"/>
+		<attribute name="hidden" for="sequence" expr="eval: __config__.app.getApp('base').getProductSequenceTypeSelect() != 'Per product category'
